import memesData from "../memesData"; import React from 'react'; export default function Meme() { /** * Challenge: * 1. Set up the text inputs to save to * the `topText` and `bottomText` state variables. * 2. Replace the hard-coded text on the image with * the text being saved to state. */ const [meme,setMeme] = React.useState({ topText: '', bottomText: '', randomImage: 'http://i.imgflip.com/1bij.jpg' }) const [allMemeImage,setAllMemeImages] = React.useState(memesData) console.log(allMemeImage) // object function getMemeImage() { const memesArray = allMemeImage.data.memes // array const randomNumber = Math.floor(Math.random() * memesArray.length) console.log(randomNumber) // random array number const url = memesArray[randomNumber].url console.log(url) // image properties setMeme(prestate =>({ ...prestate, randomImage : url })) } return (

One does not simply

Walk into Mordor

) }
